title: Contributing to xlcutter
text: Small typos grammatical errors documentation may edited directly using GitHub web interface, long changes made source file. words, please edit .R file R/ folder, .Rd files man/ folder. package uses roxygen2 automatically rebuild .Rd files.

title: Contributing to xlcutter
text: think found bug xlcutter, even ‚Äôre unsure, please let know. best way open issue GitHub: https://github.com/ropensci/Bisaloo/xlcutter Please try create reprex minimal amount code required reproduce bug encountered. Please also include session info (e.g.¬†via R command sessioninfo::session_info()). Finally, issue relates parsing specific file, remember include said file.

what: Why do I need to pass a list of files to parse rather than an entire folder?
title: Design decisions
text: early prototype package used approach taking path entire folder. quickly noticed severely lacked flexibility. example, users may subfolders main folder, may want parse files within subfolders. Alternatively, may want exclude files folder based certain pattern file name. Handling xlcutter force us add extra arguments (recursive, pattern, etc.), pass list.files(). users may even want pass individual files scattered across many folders. Passing list files rather entire folder sacrifices tiny amount ease use large increase flexibility.

what: Parse Batches of xlsx Files Based on a Template
title: Parse Batches of xlsx Files Based on a Template
text: package allows parse entire folders non-rectangular ‚Äòxlsx‚Äô files single rectangular tidy ‚Äòdata.frame‚Äô based custom template file defining column names output.

title: Parse Batches of xlsx Files Based on a Template
text: can install latest stable version package CRAN: development version GitHub :

title: Parse Batches of xlsx Files Based on a Template
text: Non-rectangular excel files common many domains. simple demonstration , use example ‚ÄúBlue timesheet‚Äù https://templates.office.com/, employees can log working hours. typical use case xlcutter example manager want get single rectangular dataset timesheets different employees. first step extract data define various columns want output template file. can mark data cells extract custom marker, default {{ column_name }}.
code: library(xlcutter)  data_files <- list.files(   system.file("example", "timesheet", package = "xlcutter"),   pattern = "\\.xlsx$",   full.names = TRUE )  template_file <- system.file(   "example", "timesheet_template.xlsx",   package = "xlcutter" )  xlsx_cutter(   data_files,   template_file ) #>   employee_firstname contract_hours employee_lastname realised_hours #> 1               Leon             35              Bedu          29.00 #> 2               Paul             35            Dupont          35.00 #> 3           Marianne             35            Lebrun          36.25 #>   manager_firstname manager_lastname period_start period_end #> 1              <NA>           Dubois   2022-01-03 2022-01-07 #> 2             Lydia           Dubois   2022-01-03 2022-01-07 #> 3             Lydia           Dubois   2022-01-03 2022-01-07

title: Parse Batches of xlsx Files Based on a Template
text: typical use cases package : hospital wants collate non-rectangular information sheets different patients single rectangular dataset

what: Validate an xlsx template file to use in xlsx_cutter() ‚Äî validate_xltemplate
title: Validate an xlsx template file to use in xlsx_cutter() ‚Äî validate_xltemplate
text: Validate xlsx template file use xlsx_cutter()

title: Validate an xlsx template file to use in xlsx_cutter() ‚Äî validate_xltemplate
code: validate_xltemplate(   template_file,   template_sheet = 1,   marker_open = "{{",   marker_close = "}}",   minimal = FALSE,   error = FALSE )

title: Validate an xlsx template file to use in xlsx_cutter() ‚Äî validate_xltemplate
text: template_file path template file use model parse xlsx files data_folder template_sheet sheet id template file use model parse xlsx files data_folder marker_open, marker_close character marker mark variables extract template_file minimal Logical (default FALSE) saying whether template contain variables delimited markers nothing else, extra text can included (ignored) error Logical (defaults TRUE) saying whether failed validations result error (TRUE) warning (FALSE)

title: Validate an xlsx template file to use in xlsx_cutter() ‚Äî validate_xltemplate
text: TRUE template valid, FALSE otherwise

title: Validate an xlsx template file to use in xlsx_cutter() ‚Äî validate_xltemplate
code: # Valid template validate_xltemplate(   system.file("example", "timesheet_template.xlsx", package = "xlcutter") ) #> [1] TRUE  # Invalid templates validate_xltemplate(   system.file("example", "template_duped_vars.xlsx", package = "xlcutter") ) #> Warning: 2 variables are duplicated in template: var1, var2 #> [1] FALSE  validate_xltemplate(   system.file("example", "template_fluff.xlsx", package = "xlcutter"),   minimal = TRUE ) #> Warning: The provided template is not minimal and includes 1 field not defining any variable #> [1] FALSE

title: Create a data.frame from a folder of non-rectangular excel files ‚Äî xlsx_cutter
code: data_files <- list.files(   system.file("example", "timesheet", package = "xlcutter"),   pattern = "\\.xlsx$",   full.names = TRUE )  template_file <- system.file(   "example", "timesheet_template.xlsx",   package = "xlcutter" )  xlsx_cutter(   data_files,   template_file ) #>   employee_firstname contract_hours employee_lastname realised_hours #> 1               Leon             35              Bedu          29.00 #> 2               Paul             35            Dupont          35.00 #> 3           Marianne             35            Lebrun          36.25 #>   manager_firstname manager_lastname period_start period_end #> 1              <NA>           Dubois   2022-01-03 2022-01-07 #> 2             Lydia           Dubois   2022-01-03 2022-01-07 #> 3             Lydia           Dubois   2022-01-03 2022-01-07

title: xlcutter (development version)
text: xlsx_cutter() internal loop won‚Äôt interrupted case file can‚Äôt parsed. avoid loosing potentially hours computation one last files fails made entire function crash. parsing issues now returned warnings end (#13, @Bisaloo).

title: xlcutter 0.1.1
text: CRAN release: 2023-10-22 xlsx_cutter() longer fails reading excel files comments blank cells (#14, @Bisaloo).
